content: this is an intermediate no-sew crochet pattern for clara the cheeseburger see below for what you need to know to complete this pattern **materials** this pattern uses the following medium weight beginner yarn baiyou beginner yarn in light brown easy peasy yarn in dark brown green yellow red white black pink 2 × 10mm safety eyes stuffing 4mm hook scissors darning/tapestry needle **terms & techniques** this pattern uses u s terms and is completed in the round rounds r magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet bobble 3 double_crochet together bobble increase increase invisible decrease decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch back loop only blo front loop only flo fasten_off invisible fasten_off embroidery
